uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher

Class WorkDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher.WorkDispatcher

  • public class WorkDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Central class for the work engine that initialises a fixed thread pool and submits work for preprocessing and processing.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int THREAD_COUNT
      The number of preview threads based on CPU count*4.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkDispatcher() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void setThreadsPerCPU(int threads)
      Reconfigure the engine WARNING: Calling this will stop any current processing!!
      static void shutdownNow()
      Shut down this engine and threads
      static java.util.concurrent.Future<WorkContainer> submitPreviewWork(java.awt.Image original, DitherStrategy dither)
      Similar to submit work (the same processing procedure is followed) however no SCR output is provided, the default resolution of 256x192 is used and the dither can be specified.
      static java.util.concurrent.Future<WorkContainer> submitWork(java.awt.Image original, boolean scrRequired)
      Submit an image to be pre processed and processed by a single thread The resulting Future contains the resulting buffered image and optional SCR bytes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • THREAD_COUNT

        public static int THREAD_COUNT
        The number of preview threads based on CPU count*4. Note that while they may not run on the individual cores it does give a good performance estimate.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkDispatcher

        public WorkDispatcher()

    • Method Detail

        public static void shutdownNow()
        Shut down this engine and threads

        Reconfigure the engine WARNING: Calling this will stop any current processing!!

      • submitWork

        public static java.util.concurrent.Future<WorkContainer> submitWork(java.awt.Image original,
                                                    boolean scrRequired)
        Submit an image to be pre processed and processed by a single thread The resulting Future contains the resulting buffered image and optional SCR bytes.
        Parameters:
        original -
        scrRequired -
        Returns:

      • submitPreviewWork

        public static java.util.concurrent.Future<WorkContainer> submitPreviewWork(java.awt.Image original,
                                                           DitherStrategy dither)
        Similar to submit work (the same processing procedure is followed) however no SCR output is provided, the default resolution of 256x192 is used and the dither can be specified.
        Parameters:
        original -
        dither -
        Returns:
